title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers Pro Bowl guard Ali Marpet announces retirement from NFL at 28
description: After seven successful seasons in the NFL, all with the Buccaneers, guard Ali Marpet announced his retirement from the NFL at the age of 28.
content:
Jarrett Bell and Mike Jones preview the biggest storylines this offseason in the NFL.
USA TODAY
